name: extemporaneity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being extemporaneous (= done or said without any preparation or thought): Extemporaneity brings life and excitement to the music. Skilled interpreters need an amount of extemporaneity and a quick mind. Related word
extemporaneous
More examplesFewer examplesThe dancers have a refreshing extemporaneity of style.The extemporaneity of his long digressions was not appreciated by his audience.The band's blend of jazz and hip-hop celebrates extemporaneity.There was a spirit of extemporaneity in the performance.We admired the extemporaneity in his speech.
